thread.section_title: Bake Me A Wish! Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bake Me A Wish! | www.bakemeawish.com | 9 of 167
thread.title: Lisa
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Lisa

author: Lisa
title: Lisa
text: My daughter is living in Philadelphia. I usually see her for her birthday, but that was not possible this year. I just had to get a birthday cake to her so I "googled" birthday cake delivery. Who knew there was such a thing? Bake me a wish was the perfect solution. Cake was delivered on time and in perfect condition. I requested AM delivery and it was there at 9:45 AM. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to be sure their loved one has a birthday cake on their birthday (or for any occasion).
